entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
